episodes.title: Luz de Amor : Part 6
episodes.description: Even after leaving the cult, Luz de Amor struggled surviving daily. While her life was moving forward, a few of her siblings weren't as successful. With a brother in prison for murder, another sister getting murdered and a third sibling struggling to survive, Luz de Amor persevered in Wichita Falls.

episodes.title: Luz de Amor
episodes.description: Born into the Children of God, Luz de Amor grew up traveling the world helping her family establish new colonies. It wasn’t until she was a teenager that she realized the love that her and others were receiving was not in fact love. This is Lou's story of how she not only escaped but how she survived. Available wherever you get your podcasts. THIS EPISODE CONTAINS DISCUSSIONS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT, CHILD ABUSE AND PHYSICAL ABUSE. LISTENER DISCRETION IS ADVISED. This cult is still in operation today under the name “The Family International”. If you or someone you know is a victim of abuse please call 1.800.799.SAFE. or text the word “START” to 88788. If you or someone you know is ready to share their story of survival from the Children of God. Please email survivinglove@cultscrimescabernet.com or direct message on any social media platform. Transcript: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xHoW8cxZqeN1l62dMQ0l2KPg_QIGH3AM/view?usp=sharing Sandy, and other survivors, are in the process of publishing a book of their experience in the Children of God. "The Hope Series : Smiling at Fear" is the first book to be published in November. episodes.title: Luz de Amor : Part 3
episodes.description: Luz de Amor continues her story throughout her teenage years into young adulthood. She talks about the sexual abuse of the younger teens and the changes that started to take place during this period. Lou also explains her experience getting in trouble with one of the “uncles” for minor child indiscretions. She tells memories of her childhood that she looks back on fondly and then others that are difficult to even talk about. One aspect of her childhood that she still smiles about today, would be music involvement. Lou was fortunate enough to not only learn about music from trained adults but she also was able to perform in front of many people. THIS EPISODE CONTAINS DISCUSSIONS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT, CHILD ABUSE AND PHYSICAL ABUSE. LISTENER DISCRETION IS ADVISED. This cult is still in operation today under the name “The Family International”. episodes.title: Sandy Ellis : Part 3
episodes.description: At just 15 years old, Sandy Ellis was entranced by the Children of God. Their charismatic personalities and angelic voices drew her in. As an adult, Sandy escaped the cult life and helped hundreds of children with her bravery. Listen to the final episode of Sandy's story into the cult that would forever change her life. Available wherever you get your podcasts. THIS EPISODE CONTAINS DISCUSSIONS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT, CHILD ABUSE AND PHYSICAL ABUSE. LISTENER DISCRETION IS ADVISED. episodes.title: Surviving Love : David Berg
episodes.description: The Children of God cult started with a prophecy from a mother to her son and quickly evolved into an international phenomenon. David Berg would influence thousands of children and adults to forsake all and follow his direction for decades. David’s idea of religion and love centered around sex, this included not only the adults but the children as well. They would learn at a very young age how to love their fellow “family” by engaging is sexual acts. This first episode Melissa, Whitney, and COG survivor, Lou discuss how this cult started and how it rapidly grew. Available wherever you get your podcasts. THIS EPISODE CONTAINS DISCUSSIONS OF SEXUAL ASSAULT, CHILD ABUSE AND PHYSICAL ABUSE. LISTENER DISCRETION IS ADVISED. This cult is still in operation today under the name “The Family International”. If you or someone you know is a victim of abuse please call 1.800.799.SAFE. or text the word “START” to 88788. episodes.title: Introducing : Surviving Love
episodes.description: The late 60’s and early 70’s was a time for free love, peace and change. People sought out religious communities and like minded individuals to share in these experiences. The Children of God became a worldwide phenomenon. With a foundation based on Christianity, the sermons quickly shifted to an extreme. One of their biggest “selling features” of the group was that they cherished and loved the children as God would. But David Berg’s definition of love was much different. As abuse intensified, leadership demands were harder and harder to meet. Self preservation was the only thing that mattered. And now they are Surviving Love. Limited Episode Series coming soon. #cults #sect #survivinglove #childrenofgod #thefamily #thefamilyinternational
